definition: topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]
to have sth go wrong/to have a problem arise/to give problems
preliminary question/priority problem/issues requiring more immediate attention
the three rural issues: agriculture, rural areas and peasants

sentences.english: "More than any other subject, weight is delicate, " Maddison said.
sentences.chinese: “體重問題比其他問題都要微妙，”麥迪遜說。

sentences.english: "More than any other subject, weight is delicate, " Maddison said.
sentences.chinese: “體重問題比其他問題都要微妙，”麥迪遜說。

sentences.english: And so Sarai took it upon herself to solve God’s problem.
sentences.chinese: 撒萊在自己解決神的問題。

sentences.english: I'm using exactly the same form to reduce this.
sentences.chinese: 我用的同樣的方法來減少問題的規模。

sentences.english: And you express that "I'm feeling this way, is it ok?"
sentences.chinese: 你可以表達“我有這樣子的感覺，沒問題吧？”

sentences.english: Ageing will put pressure on societies at all levels.
sentences.chinese: 老齡問題將對社會各階層帶來壓力。

sentences.english: The nature of the stimulus may predispose some children to attention problems.
sentences.chinese: 刺激本身很可能使一些孩子易產生注意力問題。

sentences.english: But he has one problem -- a hot temper.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他有一個問題，那就是脾氣太急燥。

sentences.english: Our service is free repairs due to a series of bar code barriers.
sentences.chinese: 我們的服務是免費維修條碼機出現一系列的障礙問題。

sentences.english: Again, they abstained from replying to my question.
sentences.chinese: 再一次，他們避開了我的問題。

sentences.english: Some problems concerned with the mast cells in the cardiac wall were discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中對心壁內這種細胞的有關問題進行了討論。

sentences.english: Problems, if any, should be solved without delay.
His mind reached after an understanding of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 他開動腦筋，想弄懂這個問題。

sentences.english: Mr Thant, however, skirts three difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 然而，有三個問題吳丹敏處理不得當。

sentences.english: Fourth, solve problems through consultation on an equal footing, instead of imposing restriction at will.
sentences.chinese: 通過平等協商解決問題，不要動輒設限和制裁。

definition: to settle (a dispute)/to resolve/to solve/to dispose of/to dispatch
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
